Jx.DatePicker

Provides a Date Picker component

Example

new Jx.DatePicker({
    value: '10/12/1982',
    onSelect: function(value){
        alert('seleccion: '+value);
    }
})

Extends

Jx.Widget

Author: Ing.  Axel Mendoza Pupo.

Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework.
